title: Sir Martin Gilbert: "Auschwitz and the Allies"
description: Sir Martin Gilbert joined Michael after Michael took a trip to Auschwitz with his book club friends, after reading "“The Holocaust A History of the Jews of Europe during WWII” and “Auschwitz and the Allies." Original air date 30 November 2006. The books were published in the 1980s.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Michael Smerconish, Martin Gilbert)
